00021 #pragma pack(push, 4)
00022 struct Traj
00023 {
00024   float dx;
00025   float dy;
00026   float dz;
00027   float md;
00028 };
00029 #pragma pack(pop)
00030 
00031 struct Geophysics
00032 {
00033   long wellbore;
00034   float startdist;
00035   float well_elev;
00036   float well_hx;
00037   float well_hy;
00038   Traj tail;
00039   short traj_ns;
00040   unsigned char traj_id;
00041   float well_md;
00042   char name[32];
00043   long cluster;
00044   DBSTATUS md_status;
00045   BEGIN_COLUMN_MAP(Geophysics)
00046     COLUMN_ENTRY(1, wellbore)
00047     COLUMN_ENTRY(2, startdist)
00048     COLUMN_ENTRY(3, well_elev)
00049     COLUMN_ENTRY(4, well_hx)
00050     COLUMN_ENTRY(5, well_hy)
00051     COLUMN_ENTRY(6, tail.dx)
00052     COLUMN_ENTRY(7, tail.dy)
00053     COLUMN_ENTRY(8, tail.dz)
00054     COLUMN_ENTRY(9, tail.md)
00055     COLUMN_ENTRY(10, traj_ns)
00056     COLUMN_ENTRY(11, traj_id)
00057     COLUMN_ENTRY_STATUS(12, well_md, md_status)
00058     COLUMN_ENTRY(13, name);
00059     COLUMN_ENTRY(14, cluster)
00060   END_COLUMN_MAP()
00061 };
00062 
00063 struct Cluster
00064 {
00065   long number;
00066   char name[6];
00067   float xcoord;
00068   float ycoord;
00069   BEGIN_COLUMN_MAP(Cluster)
00070     COLUMN_ENTRY(1, number)
00071     COLUMN_ENTRY(2, name)
00072     COLUMN_ENTRY(3, xcoord)
00073     COLUMN_ENTRY(4, ycoord)
00074   END_COLUMN_MAP()
00075 };
00076 
00077 static bool md_compare(const Traj& t, float md)
00078 {
00079   return (t.md < md);
00080 }
00081 
00082 bool surface_pick(const char* prefix, const char* surf, bool roof, Well_list& acc)
00083 {
00084   char name[0x1000];
00085   strcat(strcpy(name, prefix), ".h5");
00086   hid_t file = H5Fopen(name, H5F_ACC_RDONLY, H5P_DEFAULT);
00087   if (0 > file)
00088     return false;
00089 
00090   strcat(strcpy(name, prefix), ".mdb");
00091   CDataSource conn;
00092   HRESULT hr = conn.Open("Microsoft.Jet.OLEDB.4.0", name);
00093   if (FAILED(hr))
00094   {
00095     H5Fclose(file);
00096     return false;
00097   }
00098   else
00099   {
00100     CSession session;
00101     hr = session.Open(conn);
00102     if (FAILED(hr))
00103     {
00104       H5Fclose(file);
00105       return false;
00106     }
00107     else
00108     {
00109       DBPROP dbProp[2];
00110       dbProp[0].dwPropertyID = DBPROP_IRowsetIndex;
00111       dbProp[0].dwOptions = DBPROPOPTIONS_REQUIRED;
00112       dbProp[0].dwStatus = DBPROPSTATUS_OK;
00113       dbProp[0].colid = DB_NULLID;
00114       dbProp[0].vValue.vt = VT_BOOL;
00115       dbProp[0].vValue.boolVal = VARIANT_TRUE;
00116 
00117       dbProp[1].dwPropertyID = DBPROP_IRowsetCurrentIndex;
00118       dbProp[1].dwOptions = DBPROPOPTIONS_REQUIRED;
00119       dbProp[1].dwStatus = DBPROPSTATUS_OK;
00120       dbProp[1].colid = DB_NULLID;
00121       dbProp[1].vValue.vt = VT_BOOL;
00122       dbProp[1].vValue.boolVal = VARIANT_TRUE;
00123 
00124       DBPROPSET dbPropSet;
00125       dbPropSet.guidPropertySet = DBPROPSET_ROWSET;
00126       dbPropSet.cProperties = 2;
00127       dbPropSet.rgProperties = dbProp;
00128 
00129       CComQIPtr < IRowsetIndex > spRowsetIndex;
00130       CTable < CAccessor < Cluster > > tabl;
00131       HRESULT hr = tabl.Open(session, "cluster", &dbPropSet);
00132       if (FAILED(hr))
00133       {
00134         H5Fclose(file);
00135         return false;
00136       }
00137       else
00138       {
00139         CComQIPtr < IRowsetCurrentIndex > spRowsetCurrentIndex = tabl.m_spRowset;
00140         if (!spRowsetCurrentIndex)
00141         {
00142           H5Fclose(file);
00143           return false;
00144         }
00145         else
00146         {
00147           DBID IndexID;
00148           IndexID.eKind = DBKIND_NAME;
00149           IndexID.uName.pwszName = L"c_number";
00150           hr = spRowsetCurrentIndex->SetIndex(&IndexID);
00151           if (SUCCEEDED(hr))
00152           {
00153             spRowsetIndex = tabl.m_spRowset;
00154             CCommand < CAccessor < Geophysics > > cmd;
00155 
00156             sprintf(name, 
00157               "select "
00158                 "g.wellbore, "
00159                 "g.%s, "
00160                 "w.well_elev, "
00161                 "w.well_hx, "
00162                 "w.well_hy, "
00163                 "t.traj_dx, "
00164                 "t.traj_dy, "
00165                 "t.traj_dz, "
00166                 "t.traj_md, "
00167                 "t.traj_ns, "
00168                 "t.traj_id, "
00169                 "w.well_md, "
00170                 "w.well_name, "
00171                 "w.cluster "
00172               "from "
00173                 "geophysics g, "
00174                 "dict d, "
00175                 "well w, "
00176                 "traj t "
00177               "where "
00178                 "g.formation=d.dict_item and "
00179                 "d.dict_group=1000101 and "
00180                 "d.dict_mnemonics_ru='%s' and "
00181                 "g.wellbore=w.well_bore and "
00182                 "w.well_elev is not null and "
00183                 "w.well_hx > 0 and "
00184                 "w.well_hy > 0 and "
00185                 "g.wellbore=t.traj_wb and "
00186                 "t.traj_id=w.traj_id",
00187                 (roof? "startdist": "finaldist"),
00188                 surf);
00189 
00190             hr = cmd.Open(session, name);
00191             if (FAILED(hr))
00192             {
00193               H5Fclose(file);
00194               return false;
00195             }
00196             else
00197             {
00198               HRESULT hr = cmd.MoveNext();
00199               while (S_OK == hr)
00200               {
00201                 int n = cmd.traj_ns + 2;
00202                 std::vector<Traj> traj(n);
00203                 Traj* tt = &traj[0];
00204                 tt->dx = tt->dy = tt->dz = tt->md = 0.0f;
00205                 traj[cmd.traj_ns + 1] = cmd.tail;
00206                 if (cmd.traj_ns > 0)
00207                 {
00208                   char name[128];
00209                   sprintf(name, "/traj/version_%d/%d", (int) cmd.traj_id, (int) cmd.wellbore);
00210                   hid_t dataset = H5Dopen(file, name);
00211                   if (0 > dataset)
00212                   {
00213                     H5Fclose(file);
00214                     return false;
00215                   }
00216                   herr_t err = H5Dread(dataset, H5T_NATIVE_FLOAT, H5S_ALL, H5S_ALL, H5P_DEFAULT, &tt[1]);
00217                   if (0 > err)
00218                   {
00219                     H5Dclose(dataset);
00220                     H5Fclose(file);
00221                     return false;
00222                   }
00223                   H5Dclose(dataset);
00224                 }
00225                 if (cmd.md_status == DBSTATUS_S_OK && cmd.tail.md < cmd.well_md)
00226                 {
00227                   traj.push_back(Traj());
00228                   float t = (cmd.well_md - traj[n-2].md) / (traj[n-1].md - traj[n-2].md);
00229                   traj[n].md = cmd.well_md;
00230                   traj[n].dx = traj[n-2].dx + t * (traj[n-1].dx - traj[n-2].dx);
00231                   traj[n].dy = traj[n-2].dy + t * (traj[n-1].dy - traj[n-2].dy);
00232                   traj[n++].dz = traj[n-2].dz + t * (traj[n-1].dz - traj[n-2].dz);
00233                   tt = &traj[0];
00234                 }
00235 
00236                 int k = std::lower_bound(tt, tt+n, cmd.startdist, md_compare) - tt;
00237                 if (k < n && k > 0)
00238                 {
00239                   Sample org;
00240                   acc.push_back(Well());
00241                   Well* w = &acc.back();
00242                   w->bore = cmd.wellbore;
00243                   tabl.number = cmd.cluster;
00244                   org.xcoord = cmd.well_hx;
00245                   org.ycoord = cmd.well_hy;
00246                   if (cmd.cluster != 0 
00247                     && S_OK == spRowsetIndex->Seek(tabl.GetHAccessor(0), 1, &tabl, DBSEEK_FIRSTEQ)
00248                     && S_OK == tabl.MoveNext())
00249                   {
00250                     // org.xcoord = cluster.xcoord;
00251                     // org.ycoord = cluster.ycoord;
00252                     sprintf(w->name, "%s(%s)", cmd.name, tabl.name);
00253                   }
00254                   else
00255                   {
00256                     strcpy(w->name, cmd.name);
00257                   }
00258 
00259                   w->org.sparam = cmd.startdist;
00260                   if (tt[k].md == cmd.startdist)
00261                   {
00262                     w->org.xcoord = org.xcoord + traj[k].dx;
00263                     w->org.ycoord = org.ycoord + traj[k].dy;
00264                   }
00265                   else
00266                   {
00267                     float t = (cmd.startdist - traj[k-1].md) / (traj[k].md - traj[k-1].md);
00268                     w->org.xcoord = org.xcoord + traj[k-1].dx + t * (traj[k].dx - traj[k-1].dx);
00269                     w->org.ycoord = org.ycoord + traj[k-1].dy + t * (traj[k].dy - traj[k-1].dy);
00270                   }
00271                   
00272                   if (cmd.traj_ns > 0)
00273                   {
00274                     w->traj.reserve(n-1);
00275                     for (k = 1; k < n; ++k)
00276                     {
00277                       w->traj.push_back(Sample());
00278                       Sample* t = &w->traj.back();
00279                       t->xcoord = org.xcoord + traj[k].dx - w->org.xcoord;
00280                       t->ycoord = org.ycoord + traj[k].dy - w->org.ycoord;
00281                       t->sparam = traj[k].md;
00282                     }
00283                   }
00284                 }
00285                 hr = cmd.MoveNext();
00286               } // while(S_OK == MoveNext()) 
00287             } // SUCCEEDED(command)
00288           } // SUCCEEDED(SetIndex())
00289         } // SUCCEEDED(QueryInterface())
00290       } // SUCCEEDED(table)
00291     } // SUCCEEDED(session)
00292   } // SUCCEEDED(connection)
00293   H5Fclose(file);
00294   return (!acc.empty());
00295 }
00296 
00297 bool profile_pick(const char* prefix, const char* surf, bool roof, \
00298   int n, const long* bore, const double* xx, const double* yy, Well_list& acc)
00299 {
00300   char name[0x1000];
00301   strcat(strcpy(name, prefix), ".h5");
00302   hid_t file = H5Fopen(name, H5F_ACC_RDONLY, H5P_DEFAULT);
00303   if (0 > file)
00304     return false;
00305 
00306   double *dx = new double[n];
00307   double *dy = new double[n];
00308   dx[0] = xx[1] - xx[0];
00309   dy[0] = yy[1] - yy[0];
00310   for (int i = 1; i < n-1; ++i)
00311   {
00312     dx[i] = xx[i+1] - xx[i-1];
00313     dy[i] = yy[i+1] - yy[i-1];
00314   }
00315   dx[n-1] = xx[n-1] - xx[n-2];
00316   dy[n-1] = yy[n-1] - yy[n-2];
00317   for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i)
00318   {
00319     double dd = hypot(dx[i], dy[i]);
00320     assert(dd > 0.0);
00321     dx[i] /= dd;
00322     dy[i] /= dd;
00323   }
00324 
00325   strcat(strcpy(name, prefix), ".mdb");
00326   CDataSource conn;
00327   HRESULT hr = conn.Open("Microsoft.Jet.OLEDB.4.0", name);
00328   if (FAILED(hr))
00329   {
00330     delete[] dy;
00331     delete[] dx;
00332     H5Fclose(file);
00333     return false;
00334   }
00335   else
00336   {
00337     CSession session;
00338     hr = session.Open(conn);
00339     if (FAILED(hr))
00340     {
00341       delete[] dy;
00342       delete[] dx;
00343       H5Fclose(file);
00344       return false;
00345     }
00346     else
00347     {
00348       DBPROP dbProp[2];
00349       dbProp[0].dwPropertyID = DBPROP_IRowsetIndex;
00350       dbProp[0].dwOptions = DBPROPOPTIONS_REQUIRED;
00351       dbProp[0].dwStatus = DBPROPSTATUS_OK;
00352       dbProp[0].colid = DB_NULLID;
00353       dbProp[0].vValue.vt = VT_BOOL;
00354       dbProp[0].vValue.boolVal = VARIANT_TRUE;
00355 
00356       dbProp[1].dwPropertyID = DBPROP_IRowsetCurrentIndex;
00357       dbProp[1].dwOptions = DBPROPOPTIONS_REQUIRED;
00358       dbProp[1].dwStatus = DBPROPSTATUS_OK;
00359       dbProp[1].colid = DB_NULLID;
00360       dbProp[1].vValue.vt = VT_BOOL;
00361       dbProp[1].vValue.boolVal = VARIANT_TRUE;
00362 
00363       DBPROPSET dbPropSet;
00364       dbPropSet.guidPropertySet = DBPROPSET_ROWSET;
00365       dbPropSet.cProperties = 2;
00366       dbPropSet.rgProperties = dbProp;
00367 
00368       CComQIPtr < IRowsetIndex > spRowsetIndex;
00369       CTable < CAccessor < Cluster > > tabl;
00370       HRESULT hr = tabl.Open(session, "cluster", &dbPropSet);
00371       if (FAILED(hr))
00372       {
00373         delete[] dy;
00374         delete[] dx;
00375         H5Fclose(file);
00376         return false;
00377       }
00378       else
00379       {
00380         CComQIPtr < IRowsetCurrentIndex > spRowsetCurrentIndex = tabl.m_spRowset;
00381         if (!spRowsetCurrentIndex)
00382         {
00383           delete[] dy;
00384           delete[] dx;
00385           H5Fclose(file);
00386           return false;
00387         }
00388         else
00389         {
00390           DBID IndexID;
00391           IndexID.eKind = DBKIND_NAME;
00392           IndexID.uName.pwszName = L"c_number";
00393           hr = spRowsetCurrentIndex->SetIndex(&IndexID);
00394           if (FAILED(hr))
00395           {
00396             delete[] dy;
00397             delete[] dx;
00398             H5Fclose(file);
00399             return false;
00400           }
00401           else
00402           {
00403             spRowsetIndex = tabl.m_spRowset;
00404             float acc_xcoord = 0.0f;
00405             for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i)
00406             {
00407               CCommand < CAccessor < Geophysics > > cmd;
00408 
00409               sprintf(name, 
00410                 "select "
00411                   "g.wellbore, "
00412                   "g.%s, "
00413                   "w.well_elev, "
00414                   "w.well_hx, "
00415                   "w.well_hy, "
00416                   "t.traj_dx, "
00417                   "t.traj_dy, "
00418                   "t.traj_dz, "
00419                   "t.traj_md, "
00420                   "t.traj_ns, "
00421                   "t.traj_id, "
00422                   "w.well_md, "
00423                   "w.well_name, "
00424                   "w.cluster "
00425                 "from "
00426                   "geophysics g, "
00427                   "dict d, "
00428                   "well w, "
00429                   "traj t "
00430                 "where "
00431                   "g.formation=d.dict_item and "
00432                   "d.dict_group=1000101 and "
00433                   "d.dict_mnemonics_ru='%s' and "
00434                   "g.wellbore=w.well_bore and "
00435                   "w.well_bore=%d and "
00436                   "w.well_elev is not null and "
00437                   "w.well_hx > 0 and "
00438                   "w.well_hy > 0 and "
00439                   "g.wellbore=t.traj_wb and "
00440                   "t.traj_id=w.traj_id",
00441                   (roof? "startdist": "finaldist"),
00442                   surf, bore[i]);
00443 
00444               hr = cmd.Open(session, name);
00445               if (FAILED(hr))
00446               {
00447                 delete[] dy;
00448                 delete[] dx;
00449                 H5Fclose(file);
00450                 return false;
00451               }
00452               else
00453               {
00454                 HRESULT hr = cmd.MoveNext();
00455                 if (FAILED(hr))
00456                 {
00457                   delete[] dy;
00458                   delete[] dx;
00459                   H5Fclose(file);
00460                   return false;
00461                 }
00462                 else
00463                 {
00464                   int n = cmd.traj_ns + 2;
00465                   std::vector<Traj> traj(n);
00466                   Traj* tt = &traj[0];
00467                   tt->dx = tt->dy = tt->dz = tt->md = 0.0f;
00468                   traj[cmd.traj_ns + 1] = cmd.tail;
00469                   if (cmd.traj_ns > 0)
00470                   {
00471                     sprintf(name, "/traj/version_%d/%d", (int) cmd.traj_id, (int) cmd.wellbore);
00472                     hid_t dataset = H5Dopen(file, name);
00473                     if (0 > dataset)
00474                     {
00475                       delete[] dy;
00476                       delete[] dx;
00477                       H5Fclose(file);
00478                       return false;
00479                     }
00480                     herr_t err = H5Dread(dataset, H5T_NATIVE_FLOAT, H5S_ALL, H5S_ALL, H5P_DEFAULT, &tt[1]);
00481                     if (0 > err)
00482                     {
00483                       H5Dclose(dataset);
00484                       delete[] dy;
00485                       delete[] dx;
00486                       H5Fclose(file);
00487                       return false;
00488                     }
00489                     H5Dclose(dataset);
00490                   }
00491                   if (cmd.md_status == DBSTATUS_S_OK && cmd.tail.md < cmd.well_md)
00492                   {
00493                     traj.push_back(Traj());
00494                     float t = (cmd.well_md - traj[n-2].md) / (traj[n-1].md - traj[n-2].md);
00495                     traj[n].md = cmd.well_md;
00496                     traj[n].dx = traj[n-2].dx + t * (traj[n-1].dx - traj[n-2].dx);
00497                     traj[n].dy = traj[n-2].dy + t * (traj[n-1].dy - traj[n-2].dy);
00498                     traj[n++].dz = traj[n-2].dz + t * (traj[n-1].dz - traj[n-2].dz);
00499                     tt = &traj[0];
00500                   }
00501 
00502                   int k = std::lower_bound(tt, tt+n, cmd.startdist, md_compare) - tt;
00503                   if (k < n && k > 0)
00504                   {
00505                     Sample org;
00506                     acc.push_back(Well());
00507                     Well* w = &acc.back();
00508                     w->bore = cmd.wellbore;
00509                     tabl.number = cmd.cluster;
00510                     if (cmd.cluster != 0 
00511                       && S_OK == spRowsetIndex->Seek(tabl.GetHAccessor(0), 1, &tabl, DBSEEK_FIRSTEQ)
00512                       && S_OK == tabl.MoveNext())
00513                     {
00514                       sprintf(w->name, "%s(%s)", cmd.name, tabl.name);
00515                     }
00516                     else
00517                     {
00518                       strcpy(w->name, cmd.name);
00519                     }
00520 
00521                     w->org.xcoord = acc_xcoord;
00522                     if (i > 0)
00523                     {
00524                       w->org.xcoord += (float) hypot(xx[i] - xx[i-1], yy[i] - yy[i-1]);
00525                     }
00526                     acc_xcoord = w->org.xcoord;
00527 
00528                     w->org.sparam = cmd.startdist;
00529                     if (tt[k].md == cmd.startdist)
00530                     {
00531                       org.xcoord = traj[k].dx;
00532                       org.ycoord = traj[k].dy;
00533                       w->org.ycoord = traj[k].dz - cmd.well_elev;
00534                     }
00535                     else
00536                     {
00537                       float t = (cmd.startdist - traj[k-1].md) / (traj[k].md - traj[k-1].md);
00538                       org.xcoord = traj[k-1].dx + t * (traj[k].dx - traj[k-1].dx);
00539                       org.ycoord = traj[k-1].dy + t * (traj[k].dy - traj[k-1].dy);
00540                       w->org.ycoord = traj[k-1].dz \
00541                         + t * (traj[k].dz - traj[k-1].dz) - cmd.well_elev;
00542                     }
00543 
00544                     // if (cmd.traj_ns > 0)
00545                     {
00546                       w->traj.reserve(n);
00547                       for (k = 0; k < n; ++k)
00548                       {
00549                         w->traj.push_back(Sample());
00550                         Sample* t = &w->traj.back();
00551                         t->xcoord = float((traj[k].dx - org.xcoord) * dx[i] 
00552                           + (traj[k].dy - org.ycoord) * dy[i]);
00553                         t->ycoord = traj[k].dz - cmd.well_elev - w->org.ycoord;
00554                         t->sparam = traj[k].md;
00555                       }
00556                     }
00557                   }
00558 
00559                 } // SUCCEEDED(record)
00560               } // SUCCEEDED(command)
00561             } // for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i)
00562           } // SUCCEEDED(SetIndex())
00563         } // SUCCEEDED(QueryInterface(IRowsetCurrentIndex))
00564       } // SUCCEEDED(cluster)
00565     } // SUCCEEDED(session)
00566   } // SUCCEEDED(connection)
